# DockAccessory.BatteryState

**Structure**

A struct that represents an accessory battery state.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BatteryState
```

## Overview

This state is emitted when the battery level changes on accessory.

## Instance Properties

- **batteryLevel**: Current charge percentage (0..1) of the battery
- **chargeState**: An enumeration representing the charge state of the battery
- **lowBattery**: True when accessory deems its charge to be too low to function properly
- **name**: The name of the battery that is sending this state from accessory

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
